feed.title: Minio Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add Metrics V3 API by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19068
  • fix some typos by @thirdkeyword in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19212
  • Improve handling of compression inclusion for objects by @twelho in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19234
  • xl-meta: Add inline data bitrot check by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19240
  • update build constants by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19243
  • only look for valid buckets for metrics by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19244
  • Fix quorum calculation with zero parity objects by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19250
  • cosmetic: Move request goroutines to methods by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19241
  • feat: allow retaining parity SLA to be configurable by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19260
  • fix: do not look for non-existent bucket in decom tests by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19261
  • update all dependencies by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19235
  • allow dynamically changing max_object_versions per object by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19265

New Contributors

  • @thirdkeyword made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19212
  • @twelho made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19234

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-03-10T02-53-48Z...RELEASE.2024-03-15T01-07-19Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • write anything beyond 4k to be written in 4k pages by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19269
  • fix wrong time.Parse params order by @alingse in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19279
  • implement a flag to specify custom crossdomain.xml by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19262
  • fix: add a default requests deadline when deadline is 0 by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19287
  • add deprecated expiry_workers to be ignored by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19289
  • add additional logs for the decom during metadata save by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19288
  • feat: add user to NOTIFY_REDIS by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19285
  • change the notification queue full message by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19293
  • list: Fix IsTruncated and NextMarker when encountering expired objects by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19290
  • xl: Purge instead of moving to trash with near filled disks by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19294
  • crypto: generate OEK using HMAC-SHA256 instead of SHA256 by @aead in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19297
  • decom: Fix failed status after a failed decommission by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19300
  • Handle zero versions qualified for expiration by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19301
  • avoid triggering heals on metacache files if any by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19299
  • add IAM policyDB lookup fallbacks to drives by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19302
  • replication: enforce precondition for multipart by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19306
  • fix: peer addr returned as empty string by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19308
  • fix: Fix crash when logging events and anonymous is enabled by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19313
  • use retry during policy reload from drives by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19307
  • Encode dir obj names before expiration by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19305
  • fix batch snowball to close channel after listing finishes by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19316

New Contributors

  • @alingse made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19279

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-03-15T01-07-19Z...RELEASE.2024-03-21T23-13-43Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bug fix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Webhook targets refactor and bug fixes by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19275
  • fix: convert multiple callers to use toStorageErr(err) correctly by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19339
  • fix: should return when error happend by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19342
  • bring back minor DNS cache for k8s setups by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19341
  • Adding dashboard for MinIO node metrics by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19329
  • Fix races in IAM cache lazy loading by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19346
  • allow configuring inline shard size value by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19336
  • replication:fix precondition check for multipart by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19349

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-03-21T23-13-43Z...RELEASE.2024-03-26T22-10-45Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Support for SSE-C encrypted objects with site and bucket replication.
  • CPU issue addressed when you have 1000's of folder prefixes at bucket root.
  • LDAP support normalization of DN names for consistent behavior.

Update

This release is broken if you use IAM users, as the policy reload function is broken. You are advised to wait for the next release. If you plan an upgrade, please stick to RELEASE.2024-03-26T22-10-45Z until we make a new release.

What's Changed

  • fix: new staticheck and linter issues reported by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19340
  • fix: Remove unnecessary loops for searchParent by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19353
  • Render node graphs by node by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19356
  • feat: add env to choose which node to decom by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19310
  • set max versions to be IntMax to avoid premature failures by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19360
  • fix: avoid fan-out DeletePrefix calls for batch-expire and ILM by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19365
  • expire ILM all versions verify quorum on action by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19359
  • use bigger partSize per part for tiering to MinIO by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19361
  • ldap: improve normalization of DN values by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19358
  • fix: slice append lose the data for NSScanner by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19373
  • Pre populate the server names using a query by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19367
  • Remove empty replication stats when sending update by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19375
  • Split the replication dashboard in cluster and node level by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19374
  • Enable replication of SSE-C objects by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19107
  • Suppress error log for force-deleting object in locked bucket by @kaankabalak in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19378
  • Fix issue [#19314], resolve the absence of the sed command in ub… by @andibraeu in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19315
  • fix: sts accounts map refresh and fewer list calls by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19376
  • fix: CI warnings by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19380
  • add auditing for healing objects by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19379
  • update() inlineBlock settings properly in storageClass config by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19382
  • add static curl to container by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19383
  • Remove empty replication stats by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19385

New Contributors

  • @andibraeu made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19315

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-03-26T22-10-45Z...RELEASE.2024-03-30T09-41-56Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reduce big message RPC allocations by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19390
  • Prioritize the bucket configs first during the decommissioning by @Praveenrajmani in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19393
  • fix: missing metrics for healed objects by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19392
  • Always return slice with cap by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19395
  • Adding console targets back into systemtarget log slice by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19398
  • feat: support EdDSA/Ed25519 for oss by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19397
  • update to latest deps by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19399
  • Avoid using a nil transport when the config is not initialized by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19405
  • use GenerateKey as more reliable KMS health-check by @aead in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19404
  • Dont use deprecated angular by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19396
  • Add env variable MINIO_IDENTITY_OPENID_REDIRECT_URI to statefulset by @AlexanderThaller in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/18949
  • Add more tests for ARN and its format by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19408
  • logging: Add subsystem to log API by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19002
  • feat: add memlimit flags for setMaxResources by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19400
  • fix: ldap: use validated base DNs by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19406
  • use new generics based LRU from hashicorp by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19409
  • Set object's original modTime when being restored by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19414
  • remove frivolous log about abort-multipart failure in replication by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19413
  • turn-off Nlink readdir() optimization for NFS/CIFS by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19420
  • fix: a regression in IAM policy reload routine() by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19421
  • fix: IAM import/export: remove sts group handling by @donatello in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19422
  • Added new API errors for LDAP by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19415

New Contributors

  • @AlexanderThaller made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/18949

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-03-30T09-41-56Z...RELEASE.2024-04-06T05-26-02Z
